task.title: Verifying the service
task.shortdesc: This section provides information to verify if you are able to join a meeting, see and hear the other participants.

context.p: Verify that at least three parties can join a meeting, see, and hear each other. Two-person meetings are optimized to avoid a media path through the server and so don't provide a valid test.

p.b: To verify the service from one machine:

step.cmd: Log in to the meeting from one machine as three seperate users, each in their own browser tab.
If you can hear the user, the service is functioning.
